answerText: David Mamet[10] This dramatist's works about Eugene Jerome include Biloxi Blues and Broadway Bound, and he also wrote about the brothers Arty and Jay in Lost in Yonkers.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 11 | 21 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: For 10 points each, name these contemporary American playwrights. [10] This man described Dan Shapiro and Deborah Solomon's failed relationship in Sexual Perversion in Chicago and also wrote about the real estate industry in Glengarry Glen Ross.
